name: bucket-docs
title: Bucket Docs
description: Search Bucket docs quickly, copy the URL or open it in the browser
author: fmerian

commands.name: index
commands.title: Search Documentation
commands.subtitle: Bucket
commands.description: Search Bucket docs quickly, copy the URL or open it in the browser

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
